meanings.definition: The state or condition of being busy.
meanings.sent1: Her busynesses at work kept her occupied all day.
meanings.sent2: The busynesses of the city could be overwhelming for newcomers.
meanings.sent3: His busynesses with his pet hamster made him forget about his worries.
meanings.sent4: The busynesses of the beehive were a symphony of activity.
meanings.sent5: The busynesses of the ant colony were a marvel to behold.

meanings.definition: Activities or tasks that occupy one's time and attention.
meanings.sent1: The busynesses of preparing for the party left her exhausted but satisfied.
meanings.sent2: His busynesses with school projects often kept him up late at night.
meanings.sent3: The busynesses of the squirrel gathering nuts entertained the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: The busynesses of the factory workers resembled a well-choreographed dance.
meanings.sent5: The busynesses of the market vendors created a vibrant atmosphere.
